collections.name: customers

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifying string for the customer

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the customer

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email of the customer

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone number of the customer

properties.name: address1
properties.description: The address of the customer

properties.name: address2
properties.description: The second address of the customer, if one exists

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city the customer lives in

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state the customer lives in, by its capitalized two-letter abbreviation

properties.name: country
properties.description: The country the customer lives in

properties.name: postal_code
properties.description: The postal/zip code of the customer's address

properties.name: join_date
properties.description: The date the customer joined the brokerage

properties.name: status
properties.description: The state of the customer's account, which is either 'active', 'inactive', or 'suspended'

collections.description: The customers who have accounts with the the brokerage

collections.name: tickers

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifying string for each ticker

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: The symbol used to abbreviate the ticker name in a recognizable manner, e.g. APPL for Apple, or GOOG for Google

properties.name: name
properties.description: The full name of the ticker, e.g. the company name

properties.name: ticker_type
properties.description: The category of ticker, which is either 'stock', 'etf', or 'mutual fund'

properties.name: exchange
properties.description: The exchange that the ticker is listed on, which is either 'NASDAQ', 'NYSE', 'NYSE Arca', or 'Vanguard'

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency that the ticker is traded in, which is always 'USD'

properties.name: db2x
properties.description: The two-letter exchange code corresponding to the ticker's exchange, which is either 'NQ' for NASDAQ, 'NY' for NYSE, 'NX' for 'NYSE Arca', or 'VA' for Vanguard

properties.name: is_active
properties.description: Whether the ticker is still active

collections.description: All of the tickers that the brokerage trades

collections.name: daily_prices

properties.name: ticker_id
properties.description: The ticker id from the ticker whose price is being record

properties.name: date
properties.description: The date of the price record

properties.name: _open
properties.description: The opening price of the ticker on the day of the record

properties.name: high
properties.description: The highest price of the ticker during the day of the record

properties.name: low
properties.description: The lowest price of the ticker during the day of the record

properties.name: close
properties.description: The close price of the ticker on the day of the record

properties.name: volume
properties.description: The total number of shares of the ticker traded during the day

properties.name: epoch_ms
properties.description: The number of milliseconds since the epoch (January 1, 1970) that the record was created

properties.name: source
properties.description: The exchange where the price record originated from, which is either 'NASDAQ', 'NYSE' or 'Vanguard'

collections.description: The daily updates on tickers including their price information within a single day

collections.name: transactions

properties.name: transaction_id
properties.description: The unique identifying string for each transaction

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: The id of the customer who made the transaction

properties.name: ticker_id
properties.description: The id of the ticker being bought/sold in the transaction

properties.name: date_time
properties.description: The timestamp that the transaction was made at

properties.name: transaction_type
properties.description: The type of transaction, which is either 'buy' or 'sell'

properties.name: shares
properties.description: The number of shares being bought/sold in the transaction

properties.name: price
properties.description: The price that the ticker was bought/sold at in the transaction

properties.name: amount
properties.description: The total monetary value of the transaction (cost for buy, revenue for sell), which is the price multiplied by the number of shares

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency that the transaction was made in, which is always 'USD'

properties.name: tax
properties.description: The tax applied by the brokerage onto the transaction

properties.name: commission
properties.description: The commission taken by the brokerage for the transaction

properties.name: kpx
properties.description: The internal code used for the transaction, which corresponds to the transaction id

properties.name: settlement_date_str
properties.description: The date the transaction was settled, which is a string in the form YYYYMMDD HH:MM:SS, or null if not settled yet

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the transaction, which is either 'success', 'fail', or 'pending'

collections.description: All transactions made through the brokerage

relationships.name: transactions_made
relationships.description: All of the transactions made by the customer, including both buys and sells

relationships.name: customer
relationships.description: The customer who made the transaction

relationships.name: transactions_of
relationships.description: The transactions made of a ticker, including both buys and sells of the ticker

relationships.name: ticker
relationships.description: The ticker that the transaction was made of

relationships.name: ticker
relationships.description: The ticker that the daily price record corresponds to

relationships.name: daily_prices
relationships.description: The daily price records for the ticker

collections.name: cars

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each car

properties.name: make
properties.description: The make of the car, e.g. Ford, Toyota, etc.

properties.name: model
properties.description: The model name of the car, e..g Civic, Model 3, A4, RX350, Equinox, etc.

properties.name: year
properties.description: Year the car was manufactured

properties.name: color
properties.description: Color of the car

properties.name: vin_number
properties.description: Vehicle identification number, a unique code used to identify individual motor vehicles

properties.name: engine_type
properties.description: Type of engine (e.g., V6, V8, Electric)

properties.name: transmission
properties.description: Type of transmission, which is always either 'Automatic', 'Manual', or 'CVT'

properties.name: cost
properties.description: Cost of the car

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the car was added to the system

collections.description: All cars recorded in the dealership system

collections.name: salespeople

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each salesperson in the dealership

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the salesperson

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the salesperson

properties.name: email
properties.description: Work email of the salesperson

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Contact phone number of the salesperson, where tte first 3 digits are the area code. Format: (123)-456-7890

properties.name: hire_date
properties.description: The date the salesperson was hired

properties.name: termination_date
properties.description: The date the salesperson left the dealership, if applicable (null if still working there)

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the salesperson record was created

collections.description: The salespeople working at the dealership, current and former

collections.name: customers

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each customer

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the customer

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the customer

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address of the customer

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone number of the customer listed with the dealership

properties.name: address
properties.description: The home address of the customer given to the dealership

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city of the customer's home address

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of the customer's home address, by its capitalized two-letter abbreviation

properties.name: zip_code
properties.description: The zip-code of the customer's home address

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the customer record was created

collections.description: All the customers who are registered with the dealership

collections.name: payments_made

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each payment made

properties.name: vendor_name
properties.description: Name of the vendor to whom the payment was made

properties.name: payment_date
properties.description: Date that the payment was made

properties.name: payment_amount
properties.description: The amount that was paid in the payment in USD

properties.name: payment_method
properties.description: Method of payment, which is either 'bank_transfer', 'credit_card', 'check', or 'credit_card'

properties.name: invoice_number
properties.description: Invoice number associated with the payment

properties.name: invoice_date
properties.description: Date of the invoice

properties.name: due_date
properties.description: Due date of the invoice

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the payment made record was created

collections.description: Records of payments made by the dealership to vendors

collections.name: payments_received

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each payment received record

properties.name: sale_id
properties.description: The id of the sale that the payment is associated with

properties.name: payment_date
properties.description: Date when the payment was received. Can take place after the sale date, or in installments.

properties.name: payment_amount
properties.description: Amount of the payment received. Can be less than the sale price if the payment is made in installments.

properties.name: payment_method
properties.description: Method used to make the payment, which can be 'check', 'financing', 'credit_card', 'debit_card', or 'cash'

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the payment received record was created

collections.description: Records of payments received by the dealership from customers as part of a sale

collections.name: sales

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each car sale

properties.name: car_id
properties.description: The id of the car being purchased in the sale

properties.name: salesperson_id
properties.description: The id of the salesperson who brokered the sale

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: The id of the customer who purchased the car in the sale

properties.name: sale_price
properties.description: Price at which the car was sold

properties.name: sale_date
properties.description: Date when the car was sold

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the sale record was created

collections.description: Records of cars being purchased from the dealership from a customer via one of the salespeople

collections.name: inventory_snapshots

properties.name: _id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each inventory snapshot entry

properties.name: snapshot_date
properties.description: Date of the inventory snapshot

properties.name: car_id
properties.description: The key of the car that the inventory snapshot is for

properties.name: is_in_inventory
properties.description: Whether that specific car was in the dealership's inventory at the time of the snapshot

properties.name: crtd_ts
properties.description: Timestamp when the inventory snapshot record was created

collections.description: Records of whether specific individual cars were in the dealership's inventory as of specific dates

relationships.name: sale_records
relationships.description: All sales made where the car was sold

relationships.name: car
relationships.description: The car being purchased in the sale

relationships.name: inventory_snapshots
relationships.description: The inventory snapshots for the car, which show whether it was in the dealership's inventory at specific dates

relationships.name: car
relationships.description: The car that the inventory snapshot belongs to

relationships.name: sales_made
relationships.description: All the sales brokered by the salesperson

relationships.name: salesperson
relationships.description: The salesperson who brokered the car purchase deal

relationships.name: car_purchases
relationships.description: All car purchases made by the customer

relationships.name: customer
relationships.description: The customer who purchased the car

relationships.name: payment
relationships.description: The payment installments made for the sale, which can be one or multiple installments for a single sale

relationships.name: sale_record
relationships.description: The sale that the payment is a part of

collections.name: doctors

properties.name: doc_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each doctor in the system

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the doctor

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the doctor

properties.name: specialty
properties.description: The specialty of the doctor, which can be one of the following: dermatology, immunology, general, or oncology

properties.name: year_reg
properties.description: Year the doctor was registered and obtained license

properties.name: med_school_name
properties.description: The name of the medical school where the doctor graduated

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city where the doctor is located

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state where the doctor is located, by its capitalized two-letter abbreviation

properties.name: zip_code
properties.description: The zip code where the doctor is located

properties.name: board_certification_number
properties.description: The board certification number of the doctor

collections.description: All the doctors registered in the system

collections.name: patients

properties.name: patient_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each patient in the system

properties.name: first_name
properties.description: The first name of the patient

properties.name: last_name
properties.description: The last name of the patient

properties.name: date_of_birth
properties.description: The date the patient was born

properties.name: date_of_registration
properties.description: The date the patient was registered in the system

properties.name: gender
properties.description: The gender of the patient, which can either 'Male', 'Female', or 'Others'

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email of the patient used for contact information

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The phone number of the patient used for contact information

properties.name: street_address
properties.description: The street address of the patient's home, including street name and number

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city of the patient's address

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of the patient's address, by its capitalized two-letter abbreviation

properties.name: zip_code
properties.description: The zip code of the patient's address

properties.name: insurance_type
properties.description: The type of insurance the patient has, which can be one of the following: private, medicare, medicaid, or uninsured

properties.name: insurance_policy_number
properties.description: The policy number of the patient's insurance (null if uninsured)

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the patient in centimeters

properties.name: weight
properties.description: The weight of the patient in kilograms

collections.description: The personal & registration information about every patient registered in the system

collections.name: drugs

properties.name: drug_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each drug in the system

properties.name: drug_name
properties.description: The brand name of the drug

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: The name of the company who produces the drug

properties.name: drug_type
properties.description: The category of drug, which can be one of the following: 'biologic', 'small molecule', or 'topical'

properties.name: mechanism_of_activation
properties.description: The mechanism of activation of the drug

properties.name: fda_approval_date
properties.description: The date the drug was approved by the FDA (null if not approved because it is still under trial)

properties.name: administration_route
properties.description: The means used to administer the drug, which can be one of the following: 'oral', 'injection' or 'topical'

properties.name: recommended_dosage_amount
properties.description: The recommended amount of the drug to be taken per dose, where the unit is specified in the dosage_units property

properties.name: dosage_units
properties.description: The unit used by recommended_dosage_amount, which is either `mg` (for milligrams) or `g` (for grams)

properties.name: dose_frequency_hours
properties.description: The recommended number of hours between dosages

properties.name: national_drug_code
properties.description: The national drug code of the drug, which is a unique identifier assigned to each drug by the FDA

collections.description: The drugs listed in the system, which are used for treatment of patients

collections.name: diagnoses

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each diagnosis in the system

properties.name: code
properties.description: The code of the diagnosis, which is a unique identifier assigned to each diagnosis by the ICD-10 system

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the diagnosis, in medical terms

properties.name: description
properties.description: An elaboration of the diagnosis, in more layman's terms and/or with some symptoms included
sample values: Plaque psoriasis, the most common form
Includes flexural, erythrodermic, and other rare types
Widespread pustules on top of red skin

collections.description: Records of each diagnosis in the system, which are identified when treating patients

collections.name: treatments

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each treatment record in the system

properties.name: patient_id
properties.description: The id of the patient who is receiving the treatment

properties.name: doc_id
properties.description: The id of the doctor who is administering the treatment

properties.name: drug_id
properties.description: The id of the drug being used in the treatment

properties.name: diagnosis_id
properties.description: The id of the diagnosis the patient is being treated for

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: The date the treatment began

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: The date the treatment ended (null if ongoing)

properties.name: is_placebo
properties.description: True if the treatment is a placebo, false otherwise

properties.name: total_drug_amount
properties.description: The total quantity of the drug used in the treatment, where the unit is specified in the drug_unit property

properties.name: drug_unit
properties.description: The unit used by total_drug_amount, which is either `mg` (for milligrams) or `g` (for grams)

collections.description: The records of each treatment administered to patients in the system, which can be either a drug or a placebo

collections.name: outcomes

properties.name: outcome_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each treatment outcome in the system

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: The id for the treatment that the outcome is related to

properties.name: assessment_date
properties.description: The date when the outcome assessment was made

properties.name: day7_lesion_count
properties.description: The number of lesions counted on the patient's skin at day 7 after treatment started

properties.name: day30_lesion_count
properties.description: The number of lesions counted on the patient's skin at day 30 after treatment started (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_lesion_count
properties.description: The number of lesions counted on the patient's skin at day 100 after treatment started (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_pasi_score
properties.description: The PASI score calculated at day 7 after treatment started, (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) which is a measure of the severity of psoriasis from 0 to 72

properties.name: day30_pasi_score
properties.description: The PASI score calculated at day 30 after treatment started, (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) which is a measure of the severity of psoriasis from 0 to 72 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_pasi_score
properties.description: The PASI score calculated at day 100 after treatment started, (Psoriasis Area and Severity Index) which is a measure of the severity of psoriasis from 0 to 72 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_tewl
properties.description: TEWL score (Transepidermal Water Loss) calculated at day 7 after treatment started, which is a measure of skin hydration

properties.name: day30_tewl
properties.description: TEWL score (Transepidermal Water Loss) calculated at day 30 after treatment started, which is a measure of skin hydration, in n g/m^2/h (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_tewl
properties.description: TEWL score (Transepidermal Water Loss) calculated at day 100 after treatment started, which is a measure of skin hydration, in n g/m^2/h (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_itch_vas
properties.description: The itch visual analog scale (VAS) score at day 7 after treatment started, which is a measure of itch severity from 0 to 100

properties.name: day30_itch_vas
properties.description: The itch visual analog scale (VAS) score at day 30 after treatment started, which is a measure of itch severity from 0 to 100 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_itch_vas
properties.description: The itch visual analog scale (VAS) score at day 100 after treatment started, which is a measure of itch severity from 0 to 100 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day7_hfg
properties.description: Hair growth factor (HGF) score at day 7 after treatment started, on a scale from 0 to 5

properties.name: day30_hfg
properties.description: Hair growth factor (HGF) score at day 30 after treatment started, on a scale from 0 to 5 (null if not enough time has passed)

properties.name: day100_hfg
properties.description: Hair growth factor (HGF) score at day 100 after treatment started, on a scale from 0 to 5 (null if not enough time has passed)

collections.description: The recorded outcomes of treatments, which can include the same treatment at different points in time if not enough time has elapsed to record the complete outcome for a treatment

collections.name: concomitant_meds

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each concomitant medication record in the system

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: The id of the treatment that the concomitant medication record is related to

properties.name: medicine_name
properties.description: The name of the medicine being taken by the patient as a concomitant drug

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: Date the concomitant drug treatment was started

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: Date the concomitant drug treatment finished (null if ongoing)

properties.name: dose_amount
properties.description: The amount of the medicine taken per dose, where the unit is specified in the dose_unit property

properties.name: dose_unit
properties.description: The unit used by dose_amount

properties.name: dose_frequency
properties.description: The frequency of the dose in hours (null if one-time use)

collections.description: Records of medications that are taken by patients in addition to the treatment they are receiving during their treatment

collections.name: adverse_events

properties.name: _id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each adverse event record in the system

properties.name: treatment_id
properties.description: The id for the treatment that the adverse event occurred during

properties.name: reported_date
properties.description: The date the adverse event was reported

properties.name: description
properties.description: Descriptor of the adverse event, which can be a single word or a phrase

collections.description: All records of adverse events that have been reported in the system  related to a treatment

relationships.name: doctor
relationships.description: The doctor who administered the treatment

relationships.name: prescribed_treatments
relationships.description: The treatments prescribed/administered by the doctor

relationships.name: patient
relationships.description: The patient who the treatment was administered to

relationships.name: treatments_received
relationships.description: The drug treatment regimens the patient has been a part of

relationships.name: drug
relationships.description: The drug being used as part of the treatment

relationships.name: treatments_used_in
relationships.description: The treatments the drug was used in

relationships.name: diagnosis
relationships.description: The diagnosis associated with the treatment which the drug is treating

relationships.name: treatments_for
relationships.description: The drug treatment regimens targeted at a patient with this diagnosis

relationships.name: outcome_records
relationships.description: The reported outcomes of the treatment, which can include the same treatment at different points in time if not enough time has elapsed to record the complete outcome for a treatment

relationships.name: treatment
relationships.description: The treatment that the outcome record is reporting on

relationships.name: concomitant_meds
relationships.description: The ancillary medications that were taken by a patient in addition to the treatment they are receiving during their treatment

relationships.name: treatment
relationships.description: The treatment that the administration of the concomitant medication was related to

relationships.name: adverse_events
relationships.description: Any incident events recorded in association with the treatment

relationships.name: treatment
relationships.description: The treatment that the adverse event occurred during

collections.name: users

properties.name: uid
properties.description: The unique identifier for each user in the system

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username for the user

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email for the user

properties.name: phone_number
properties.description: The phone number for the user (null if not provided), which always starts with a `+` and the country code and does not have dashes

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the user account was created

properties.name: last_login_at
properties.description: The last time the user logged into their account (null if never logged in)

properties.name: user_type
properties.description: The type of user, which can be either `individual` or `business`

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the user account, which can be either `active`, `inactive`, `deleted` or `suspended`

properties.name: country
properties.description: The two-letter country code for the country of the user

properties.name: address_billing
properties.description: The billing address for the user, including street address, city, sometimes province/country, and postal code

properties.name: address_delivery
properties.description: The delivery address for the user, including street address, city, sometimes province/country, and postal code, or null if not provided

properties.name: kyc_status
properties.description: The KYC status, which can be either `approved`, `pending`, or `rejected`

properties.name: kyc_verified_at
properties.description: The date when the kyc status became verified (null if not provided)

collections.description: Every user in the system, which can be either an individual or a business

collections.name: merchants

properties.name: mid
properties.description: Unique identifier for each merchant in the system

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the merchant

properties.name: description
properties.description: The detailed description of what the merchant does or sells

properties.name: website_url
properties.description: The URL to the merchant's website

properties.name: logo_url
properties.description: The URL to the merchant's logo image

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the merchant was registered in the system

properties.name: country
properties.description: The two-letter capitalized country code for the country of the merchant

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state for the merchant within the country, or null if not applicable

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city for the merchant's location within the country

properties.name: postal_code
properties.description: The postal/zip code of the merchant's location within the city

properties.name: address
properties.description: The full address of the merchant, including street address, city, sometimes province, and postal code

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the merchant account, which can be either `active`, `inactive` or `suspended`

properties.name: category
properties.description: The blanket category/industry/market segment that the merchant is in

properties.name: sub_category
properties.description: The more specific category/industry/market segment that the merchant is in within the category

properties.name: merchant_category_code
properties.description: The category code for the merchant, which is a 4-digit number that identifies the type of business

properties.name: contact_name
properties.description: The full name of the individual who is the primary contact for the merchant

properties.name: contact_email
properties.description: The email of the contact person for the merchant

properties.name: contact_phone
properties.description: The phone number of the contact person, which always starts with a `+` and the country code and does not have dashes

collections.description: The merchant accounts registered in the system

collections.name: coupons

properties.name: cid
properties.description: The unique identifier for each coupon in the system

properties.name: merchant_id
properties.description: The id of the merchant who issues the coupon

properties.name: code
properties.description: The code used to enter the coupon

properties.name: description
properties.description: A verbal description of what hte coupon is for

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: The date when the coupon first became valid

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: The date when the coupon is no longer valid

properties.name: discount_type
properties.description: The category of the coupon, which can be either `percentage` or `fixed_amount`

properties.name: discount_value
properties.description: The value of the discount, which is the percentage off if the discount type is `percentage`, or the number of dollars off if `fixed_amount`

properties.name: min_purchase_amount
properties.description: The minimum amount of money that must be spent on a purchase in USD to be eligible for the coupon (null if not applicable)

properties.name: max_discount_amount
properties.description: The maximum amount of money that can be saved using the coupon in USD (null if not applicable)

properties.name: redemption_limit
properties.description: The maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed before expiring/becoming invalid (null if not applicable)

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the coupon, which can be either `active`, `inactive`, or `expired`

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: Timestamp when the coupon record was created in the system

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: Timestamp when the coupon record was last updated in the system (null if never updated after creation)

collections.description: The records of coupons that have been issued by merchants in the system

collections.name: transactions

properties.name: txid
properties.description: The unique identifier for each transaction in the system (the original transaction & coupon applied are different rows with different values of this key)

properties.name: sender_id
properties.description: The id of the key of the individual who sent the transaction, which is either the id of a user or a merchant, depending on sender_type

properties.name: sender_type
properties.description: Which type of individual sent the transaction: 0 for user (meaning sender_id is a uid from users) or 1 for merchant (meaning sender_id is a mid from merchants)

properties.name: receiver_id
properties.description: The id of the key of the individual who received the transaction, which is either the id of a user or a merchant, depending on receiver_type

properties.name: receiver_type
properties.description: Which type of individual received the transaction: 0 for user (meaning receiver_id is a uid from users) or 1 for merchant (meaning receiver_id is a mid from merchants)

properties.name: amount
properties.description: The dollar amount of the transaction, which is the total amount for a record without a coupon applied, or the amount saved/rebated when the coupon is applied

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the transaction, which can be either `success`, `failed`, `refunded`, or `pending`

properties.name: transaction_type
properties.description: The means the transaction was made, which can be either `credit` or `debit

properties.name: description
properties.description: The category of transaction, which either says what was purchased or 'Coupon discount' if the transaction is a coupon discount being applied to a previous transaction in the system

properties.name: coupon_id
properties.description: The id of the coupon being used in the transaction, or null if the transaction is not a coupon discount

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the transfer was created in the system

properties.name: completed_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the transfer was completed (null if not completed yet)

properties.name: transaction_ref
properties.description: Randomly generated uuid4 for users' reference

properties.name: gateway_name
properties.description: The portal through which the transaction was made, which can be either 'Stripe', 'PayPal', 'Checkout.com', 'Braintree' or 'Adyen'

properties.name: gateway_ref
properties.description: A reference number generated by the payment gateway for the transaction, which is used to track the transaction in the payment processor's system

properties.name: device_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for the device used to make the transaction

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: The IP address of the device used to make the transaction

properties.name: user_agent
properties.description: The user agent used to make the transaction, which is a string that identifies the browser, operating system, and device type of the device used to make the transaction
sample values: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 16_3_1 like Mac OS X) ...

collections.description: Every transaction that has occurred in the system, where the source can be either a user or a merchant and the destination can be either a user or a merchant. If a coupon is used, there will be two identical transaction records, one for the original transaction (where the coupon id is null) and one for the coupon discount applied (where the coupon id is provided)

collections.name: user_balances

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: The id of the user whose account balance is being recorded

properties.name: balance
properties.description: The balance of the user's account in USD on the date of the record

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the user's balance was recorded

collections.description: The records of users' account balances in the system, which can include negative balances and multiple records for the same user made at different points in time

collections.name: merchant_balances

properties.name: merchant_id
properties.description: The id of the merchant whose account balance is being recorded

properties.name: balance
properties.description: The balance of the user's account in USD on the date of the record

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the merchant's balance was recorded

collections.description: The records of merchants' account balances in the system, which can include negative balances and multiple records for the same merchant made at different points in time

collections.name: notifications

properties.name: notif_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for each notification in the system

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: The id for the user who received the notification

properties.name: message
properties.description: The message contained in the notification sent to the user
sample values: Your CodeSuite subscription will renew on 7/1
Here''s $10 to start your glow up!'
Reminder: Your FitLife membership expires in 7 days
An order from UrbanDining was unsuccessful
Weekend Flash Sale: 25% off all activewear!

properties.name: notification_type
properties.description: The type of notification message, which can be either `transaction`, `promotion`, or `general`

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the notification, which can be either `read`, `unread`, or `archived`

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the notification was created

properties.name: read_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the notification was read (null if not read yet)

properties.name: device_type
properties.description: The type of device/medium the notification was sent through, which can be either `mobile_app`, `email`, `sms`, or `web_app`

properties.name: device_id
properties.description: The id of the device the notification was sent to, or null if the device type does not have device ids

properties.name: action_url
properties.description: The URL included in hte notification that the user can click on to take action; can be external https or deeplink url within the app

collections.description: All notifications sent to users in the system, such as alerts, reminders, and promotional messages

collections.name: user_sessions

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: The id of the user who the session belongs to

properties.name: session_start
properties.description: The timestamp when the user session started

properties.name: session_end
properties.description: The timestamp when the user session ended

properties.name: device_type
properties.description: The type of device the session was made with, which can be either `web_app` or `mobile_app`

properties.name: device_id
properties.description: The id of the device the session was made with

collections.description: The records of user sessions in the system, which can include multiple sessions for the same user made at different points in time, each session with a start/end timestamp

collections.name: user_setting_snapshots

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: The id for the user whose settings are being recorded

properties.name: snapshot_date
properties.description: The date when the setting snapshot was taken

properties.name: daily_transaction_limit
properties.description: The cap in settings of how much the user account allows to be spent in a single day

properties.name: monthly_transaction_limit
properties.description: The cap in settings of how much the user account allows to be spent in a single month

properties.name: membership_status
properties.description: The member's status level within the system: 0 for bronze, 1 for silver, 2 for gold, 3 for platinum, 4 for VIP

properties.name: password_hash
properties.description: The hashed password of the user, which is used to verify the user's identity when they log in

properties.name: api_key
properties.description: The user's API key, which is used to authenticate the user when they make API requests (null if not provided)

properties.name: verified_devices
properties.description: A comma-separated list of the ids of the devices that have been verified for the user (null if not provided)

properties.name: verified_ips
properties.description: A comma-sparated list of the IP addresses that have been verified for the user (null if not provided)

properties.name: mfa_enabled
properties.description: Whether the user has enabled multi-factor authentication (MFA) for their account

properties.name: marketing_opt_in
properties.description: Whether the user has opted in to receive marketing communications

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The timestamp when the record was added to the system

collections.description: The records of user settings in the system, which can include multiple updates for the same user made at different points in time

relationships.name: transactions_sent
relationships.description: All transactions made where the user is the sender

relationships.name: sending_user
relationships.description: The user who sent the transaction, if it was sent by a user (not found if it was sent by a merchant)

relationships.name: transactions_received
relationships.description: The transactions where the user was the recipient

relationships.name: receiving_user
relationships.description: The user who received the transaction, if it was received by a user (not found if it was received by a merchant)

relationships.name: balances
relationships.description: The historical account balance for the user, which can include multiple updates over time

relationships.name: user
relationships.description: The user who the account balance belongs to

relationships.name: notifications
relationships.description: The notifications that have been sent to the user

relationships.name: user
relationships.description: The user who received the notification

relationships.name: sessions
relationships.description: The login sessions by the user

relationships.name: user
relationships.description: The user who the login session information belongs to

relationships.name: setting_snapshots
relationships.description: The setting snapshot history for the user, which can include multiple updates over time

relationships.name: user
relationships.description: The user who the setting snapshot belongs to

relationships.name: transactions_sent
relationships.description: The transactions sent by the merchant

relationships.name: sending_merchant
relationships.description: The merchant who sent the transaction, if it was sent by a merchant (not found if it was sent by a user)

relationships.name: transactions_received
relationships.description: The transactions received by the merchant

relationships.name: receiving_merchant
relationships.description: The merchant who received the transaction, if it was received by a merchant (not found if it was received by a user)

relationships.name: balances
relationships.description: The historical account balance for the merchant, which can include multiple updates over time

relationships.name: merchant
relationships.description: The merchant who the account balance information belongs to

relationships.name: coupons
relationships.description: The coupons issued by the merchant

relationships.name: merchant
relationships.description: The merchant who issued the coupon

relationships.name: transaction_used_in
relationships.description: The transactions that the coupon was used in

relationships.name: coupon
relationships.description: The coupon that was used in the transaction, if one exists
